perk.name: Cunning
perk.description: Reduces cooldown by 1 for the fourth skill chosen.

perk.name: Gifted
perk.description: 5% of potions spawn as mana potions. Mana potions reduce a cooling skill by 1.

perk.name: Intimidating
perk.description: Mortal enemy encounters occur 50% less often.

flaw.name: Zealous
flaw.description: Special skulls arrive 1 turn sooner than usual.

perk.name: Daring
perk.description: 100% bonus chance when tracing paths of 10+ tiles.

flaw.name: Cocky
flaw.description: Matching only 3 tiles yields no reward.

perk.name: Agile
perk.description: 5% of swords spawn as arrows that can match enemies one tile away.

flaw.name: Clumsy
flaw.description: 3% of shields spawn broken and provide no defense.
